name: Single Halo Pendant
content: Luxurious, elegant and brilliant are the words that describe the beauty of the Single Halo MDA2102 Diamond Pendant. With a prominent large diamond design in the center attached to 4 spokes, it creates a feeling of safety and security.

name: Halo Floral Pendant
content: Like other classic Halo designs, the Halo Floral MDA2104 pendant brings elegance, nobility and shines brightly from every angle. The pendant stands out with a large round diamond fixed on 6 prongs combined with a Halo ring of sheet stones attached into flower petals that completely hug the main diamond.

name: Cushion Halo Pendant
content: Unique and feminine is what the Cushion Halo MDA2107 women's pendant brings to the wearer. New design with Cushion master, this is a square diamond shape with rounded corners creating softness and femininity for the jewelry.

name: Custom Halo Pendant
content: With the message Every woman is a brilliant flower, Tierra brings a collection of mesh pendants with the main design being jade flowers and amethyst, of which the Custom Halo MDA2117 women's sword pendant becomes famous. turned on by his beautiful cruelty.

name: Heart-Shaped Reverse Pendant
content: With the message Every woman is a brilliant flower, Tierra brings a collection of mesh pendants with the main design being jade flowers and amethyst, of which the Custom Halo MDA2117 women's sword pendant becomes famous. turned on by his beautiful cruelty.
